channel.title: 562 Any way to reset econ w/o deleting player files?
channel.description:
Just wondering if there is any way to reset economy on a 562, I know there are multiple bat files for 317's and stuff, but never seen a 562, anyone got suggestions???
ALSO IF ANYONE KNOWS, HOW DO I ALLOW SOMEONE TO DROP ITEMS, it's something to do with destroyitem or sumtin.
Thanks in advance.
